extendedInfo.description: This app measures Sexual appetite of a person based on scientific findings, traditional, Western, Indian and Chinese 'Face reading' concepts (applicable to age 18+) evolved through thousands of years similar to yoga. A mathematical model is used to arrive a scoring in the scale of 0 through 100. This should NOT be treated as an alternative to any medical examination. It should be considered as indicative scoring. Please click on start button to begin. Please click on forward arrow button through the questions and choose the closest answer to the questions. After answering all the questions, you will be presented with a score!  Women can use this as precaution tool while travelling or while alone to stay away from men who score more than XQ score of 90.How to operate on this appIt is as simple as click on forward arrow button and back arrow button between questions and respond to the questions by taping the closest match you can think of. If you like this app (we bet on this), you can share this app's download link to your friends and have a group fun measuring each others Sexual appetite. Who knows? It could be a revelation of your hidden tastes!A word on scoringSexual appetite score generated by this app is based on statistical study of thousands of people especially known for high sexual interest. Remember the sexual appetite score does not show the fertility levels of a person. The possibility of a wrong result is as low as 5 to 10% based on our extensive experiments with numerous samples.We expect this app would be a tool to protect women from sexual harassment and men may find this app as real interesting stuff.Disclaimer: The result does not absolute value of sexual appetite but a subjective result similar to face reading resultsHow it helps a woman to save from potential sexual assault?1. A woman travels alone and there are only few men around her who are strangers2. The woman wants to assess potential danger of possible sexual assault based on face reading. She takes 'Sexual appetite meter' from her iPhone or Android andAssess the strangers3. She finds couple of guys who has XQ score above 904. She takes precaution to call police (get ready with police Helpline number) so that she can report to police in single press or click in case of danger5. Based on score she can also take decision to stay away from such people in any situation, if there is no reliable support
